roleset.name: make greater
roleset.note: BEEF_UP-V NOTES: I rather doubt the higher # args will appear, but they're there forcompleteness. (from beef.01-v)

role.descr: enhanced by how much, EXT or MNR

example.name: where's the beef?
example.text: Mr. Jones has also beefed up his marketing staff to sell the 118 luxury suites topping Texas Stadium (his deal with Bum Bright included operating rights for the stadium).
example.arg: to sell the 118 luxury suites topping Texas Stadium
